resources.string: CHelix is the official club of Civil department for fest nimbus.
Ojas is the official club of EEE department for fest nimbus.
Medextrous is the official club of Mechanical department for fest nimbus.
Vibhav is the official club of ECE department for fest nimbus.
Team .exe is the official club of CSE department for fest nimbus.
Design-o-crats is the official club of Architecture department for fest nimbus.
Hermetica is the official club of Chemical department for fest nimbus.

NIMBUS is the annual technical festival of National Institute of Technology, Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India. It is touted to be an amalgamation of ideas, expressions, innovations, prototypes, knowledge channels, taken to the most premier levels. Nimbus has become the biggest technical festival of Northern India.
NIMBUS is the annual technical festival of NIT Hamirpur, Himachal Pradesh, India. Nimbus has become the biggest technical festival of Northern India.
A Open Source Project by AppTeam NITH for TechFest Nimbus2k16.\n\nSource code available at GitHub.
